topic.title: Eastern Divide
topic.shortdesc: The night starts at Eastern Divide, a local brewery and restaurant

image.alt: The inside dining area of Eastern Divide

li.p: Eastern Divide is great for just hanging out and having a few drinks, particularly in the summer because of its outdoor seating
Eastern Divide brews all of their own beer in-house using their 10-barrel system and has a kitchen with an extensive menu
For food, I recommend the smash burger, but the chicken sandwiches are also outstanding
Their beer menu rotates, so I can't recommend a single one, but my favorite is always the lightest beer on the menu
